Cursed when? Before Singed's experiments, or after he was thrown out? Either case, I think Soraka doesn't really have a reason to even meet Warwick.

I don't think that he muttered Soraka's name, given that *he wouldn't know about her yet.* Even in the old lore, it is Singed, and NOT Warwick that engineers the serum for Warwick and divulges the knowledge that it's the heart of a Celestial that will stabilize it - Warwick didn't know or care about Soraka until he needed to rip her heart out. 
Time warp to the modern story. We know via Camille's interactions with Singed that he's trying to create an elixir of immortality. We know from this short story's opening that Singed is trying to create the perfect hunter. Put two and two together and you'll realize why - Singed wants Soraka's heart for his elixir of immortality, and he needs someone or something to hunt it down and bring it to him. This is why he's gone through so much painstaking effort to create a feral beast like Warwick - and this is exactly why Warwick wouldn't have uttered Soraka's name.
Furthermore, Soraka resides in Ionia. When Singed took the name uttered by Warwick as a start for his search and set up his lab again, he didn't move to Ionia and create an outpost there - he relocated his lab in Zaun. I would think he'd have mentioned if he had to go overseas, and the fact that he didn't and that his creation is running amok in Zaun is proof enough that Singed is trying to locate his hunter before setting off to find Soraka.

I don't think we should fully go with Singed's description of Warwick, he might have just seen him as some guy in a brawl on the street but aside from that I don't think they have a past.

In old lore (before the retcon) Singed was Warwick's apprentice until Soraka cursed Warwick and turned him into a werewolf.  Singed then took over supplying the Noxian Invasion with potions and stuff.

In the more recent lore, Warwick is some sort of bounty hunter that Singed sometimes employed to bring him rare materials.  Warwick wanted to become a better hunter and requested a potion from Singed that would enhance his abilities.  It required Soraka's heart, which Warwick failed to get, and thus the potion transformed him into a beast.  He now hunts Soraka to try to stabilize his transformation.

Whether this story has anything to do with Warwick and his new game update remains to be seen.
